00033 bool matlabWriteVirtualVector(V * vec, const char * filename, const char * name);

00045 class SURFIT_EXPORT matlabVector {
00046 public:
00048         virtual REAL operator()(int i) const = 0;
00050         virtual long size() const = 0;
00055         bool writeMAT(const char * filename, const char * name);
00056 
00057 };
00058 
00069 class SURFIT_EXPORT matlabSparseMatrix {
00070 public:
00072         virtual long cols() const = 0;
00074         virtual long rows() const = 0;
00076         virtual REAL operator()(int i, int j, int * next_i = NULL) const = 0;
00077 
00082         bool writeMAT(const char * filename, const char * name);
00083
